description:
Zoro finally lands a blow against the killer giraffe, but Luffy still can`t find a way to break through against Lucci! Can Frank reach Robin before it`s too late!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fierce Sword Attacks! Zoro vs. Kaku, Powerful Sword Fighting Showdown
Hakujin no Moushuu! Zoro Tai Kaku Kyouryoku Zangeki Taiketsu
Les armes blanches s’entrechoquent ! Zoro contre Kaku, duel de fine lames
Мечи скрестились! Зоро против Каку, неистовая дуэль
白刃[はくじん]の猛襲! ゾロ対カク強力斬撃対決
